data.why:
A short module that imports physical constants in Astronomy for use
    in calculations. Designed to be usable by other modules such as
    Astro::Cosmology and the number crunching bunch, it hopes to provide
    a proper module interface to Jeremy Bailin's Astroconst
    (http://clavelina.as.arizona.edu/astroconst/) package.

    The module would be called Astro::Constants (with 2 more packages,
    Astro::Constants::CGS and Astro::Constants::MKS) and is still
    pre-alpha.
